title: ezhundiru nija
sahitya:
ezhundiru nija manidA uLLattininrE


anupallavi

  azhundiruL aghanradu shezhundiru naghaiyuDan aruNan ezhundu jnAnak-kiraNam parappum vELai


caraNam    kAma mOhiniyinai nAma japattAl OTTi kalangum buddhiyai uNmai tulangum arivAl tETri
tAmada mAyai keDa Om shuddha shakti ennum tArakam koND-Atma dhIra vIra sUranAi
